---
title: Calculating Risk Scores for Insurance Policies (RISKPROG) - Overview
---
# Overview

This document describes the flow for processing property insurance policy records. Each record is validated and assigned a risk score based on property type, claim history, and location factors, supporting underwriting and pricing decisions.
